This move simply entails A squeezing the target's face with his hand. He uses this technique on [[Killer B]] whenever he get irritated with B's behaviour.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 467, page 19</ref><ref>''Naruto'' chapter 473, page 8</ref><ref>''Naruto'' chapter 542, page 8</ref> [[Gyūki]] has seen A do this to B several times to the point it even mentions he would give B the Iron Claw for helping [[Naruto]] escape from [[Genbu]].<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 536, page 4</ref>

== Trivia ==
* In [[wikipedia:wrestling|wrestling]], there is an actual move that resembles this one called the "[[Wikipedia:Professional wrestling holds#Clawhold|claw hold]]".
* In ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm Generations]]'', A uses this as an actual technique, infusing his hand with [[lightning]]-natured [[chakra]] and then slamming his opponent's head into the ground to cause more devastating effects.
